Title: Trippy
Description: Trippy is a trip planner web app that allows users to plan their trips, manage activities for each trip, and provides the ability to delete and update trips and activities.

Title: Cash Sync
Description: CashSync is an expense tracker website that allows user to manage their expenses, add new expenses, delete them, and filter expenses by text and date.

Title: Morden Decors
Description: An aesthetically pleasing and highly responsive website for an interior design shop.

Title: Weathery
Description: The Weather Website provides real-time weather data, including geolocation-based information, city-specific searches, hourly forecasts, and a range of other features.

Title: Board.
Description: A highly responsive authentication page and a dynamic dashboard page, enriched with interactive charts for data visualization and analysis.
